## Product To Do
- Product Docs
    - [ ] Initiative Brief
    - [ ] Feature Reference & Traceability Report (for Appts)
    - [ ] QA Plan
    - [ ] Product Guide(s)
    - [ ] Release Notes
- Metrics
    - [ ] Define Metrics to Capture
    - [ ] Create GA4 dashboard
    - [ ] Create DD dashboard
- Test Rail 
    - [ ] Create Test Plan
    - [ ] Create Regression Plan
    - [ ] Create Test Cases
    - [ ] Create Test Run(s)    
    - [ ] Run test runs
    - [ ] Run summary reports (2)
